description: This query is ambiguous. Please clarify if you are looking for a definition of 'ill-being', a list of terms related to ill-being, or something else. I will assume you want a list of terms related to 'ill-being'.

related_terms.definition: The state of undergoing pain, distress, or hardship.
Extreme anxiety, sorrow, or pain.
A state or condition of great wretchedness or unhappiness.
The state of not being happy; sadness.
Slight pain or unease.
A general feeling of discomfort, illness, or unease whose exact cause is difficult to identify.
Severe mental or physical suffering.
Extreme physical or mental suffering.
The state of being in a very unhappy or unfortunate state.
Difficulties; misfortune.
Severe suffering or privation.
A deeply distressing or disturbing experience.
A state of mental or emotional strain or tension resulting from adverse or demanding circumstances.
A feeling of worry, nervousness, or unease, typically about an imminent event or something with an uncertain outcome.
A mood disorder that causes a persistent feeling of sadness and loss of interest.
Intense sorrow, especially caused by someone's death.
The complete loss or absence of hope.
The feeling or state of being without hope.
A tendency to see the worst aspect of things or believe that the worst will happen.
The state or experience of being isolated from a group or an activity to which one should belong or in which one should be involved.
Sadness because one has no friends or company.
The state of being alone or lonely.
The quality or state of being exposed to the possibility of being attacked or harmed, either physically or emotionally.
Lack of power; inability to influence or control events.
